text: Sergey Lebedev or Sergei Lebedev or Sergej Lebedev may refer to : *Sergey Lebedev (chess player) (1868–1942), Russian chess player *Sergey Lebedev (chemist) (1874–1934), Russian chemist *Sergey Lebedev (scientist) (1902–1974), Russian electrical engineer and computer scientist *Sergey Lebedev (politician) (born 1948), Uzbekistan-born Russian politician *Sergey Lebedev (footballer) (born 1969), Uzbekistan-born Soviet association football midfielder
title: Sergey Lebedev
